attributes.review: When I downloaded this we got a call two seconds later that my grandmother was killed. I believe trump spied on me through my phone and hunted down my grandmother and proceeded to beat her with a butter sock. Do not recommend
attributes.title: Absolutely horrible

attributes.review: I wanted to download this app to see all the hype on our favorite orange but all I saw was him and his goofy looking smile standing at the podium 🙄 don’t download this app it is not worth your time I can definitely confirm that you’ll hate it
attributes.title: Horrible and a waste of time

attributes.review: Terrible, the app kept crashing and when it finally was working I could not find a single reason to vote for this horrible man very disappointed in our country.
attributes.title: Terrible!

attributes.review: this app completely ruined my phone. the only thing i can do after downloading it is make reviews on apps and watch tik tok. i would NEVER download this app again. if i could i would give it a 0 out of 5 stars.
attributes.title: ew

attributes.review: This app has ruined my phone. After taking almost a day to download i open my phone and it is a photo of trump naked being spray tanned. It glitched my phone out and that photo stayed there until my phone died. Do not download this app.
attributes.title: I

attributes.review: App made me become a racist l accidentally beat my neighbor up for saying blm. I was disgusted with myself. I can’t believe anyone would want this. Not to mention it took a week and a half to download. What even is up with that I couldn’t believe my eyes.
attributes.title: Literal trash

attributes.review: This app legit took me all day to download and I couldn’t use my phone for anything else!! Then when the app opened it started glitching me out badly! The app keeps asking me for money even when I’m not in it. Not very cash money if you Trump!!
attributes.title: Redicioulus💖✨🧚‍♀️

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to learn more about trumps campaign and they made me put in all my information which I think they give out and I’ve been receiving texts and phone calls ever since
attributes.title: Mexican

attributes.review: I don’t really write reviews but there’s something wrong with this app. Every time I go In it kicks me out. I  think it put a Virus on my phone. If I were you I wouldn’t download it . I should have read the comments 😢
attributes.title: Glitches

attributes.review:
trashy app. expected more from a billionaire. trump should consider taking this app off the App Store as it is very dangerous and i see it is a national security threat like tiktok apparently is. 

to trump: i see u tried with this app but please just delete it and don’t try again
